body.p: I once promised to write you & as often as convientconvenient
So far I have fullfilledfulfilled my part. Since my joineingjoining My Regiment It has been nothing but marching & fighting the Johnnys. I can say that we are enough for them if not too much
There has not been a fight but what they have been worsted
Our Cavalry forces have started on an other raid of 10 days rations
I left the Regiment last Monday. The reason of my leaveingleaving was because I could not see to ride or walk. I was poisionedpoisoned how or in what manner I can not tell.
I will write to you as often as possible Even if it is pencil marks

I hope that this may find you enjoying good health Give my respects to the inmates of Ward. A, of Armory Square Hospital & tell Thom. Woodwurth that I would be very glad to hear from him. I will close by hopeinghoping to see you before long
Should you wish to write Direct to Com. H. First Mich. Cav. first Brig. first Division. Washington DC
